exec hof mod get all@latest
cmp cue.mod/module.cue match/cue.mod/module-get.cue

# we really need a different set of purposefully set public repos to test this with
# every time we update hof, this breaks

-- cue.mod/module.cue --
module: "github.com/hof/test"
cue: "0.6.0"

require: {
	"github.com/hofstadter-io/hof": "v0.6.8-rc.6"
}

indirect: {
	"github.com/hofstadter-io/ghacue": "v0.2.0"
	"github.com/hofstadter-io/hofmod-cli": "v0.8.0"
}
-- match/cue.mod/module-get.cue --
module: "github.com/hof/test"
cue:    "0.6.0"

require: {
	"github.com/hofstadter-io/hof": "v0.6.8"
}

indirect: {
	"github.com/hofstadter-io/cuelm":      "v0.2.0"
	"github.com/hofstadter-io/ghacue":     "v0.2.0"
	"github.com/hofstadter-io/hofmod-cli": "v0.8.9"
	"github.com/hofstadter-io/supacode":   "v0.0.7"
}
